overview: Defilement of a Porcelain Doll tells the story of a deranged artist living beneath the train tracks of a city in ruin, as she abducts women and uses them as canvases for her artistic catharsis. Taking their indecent bodies and purifying them through obscenity and putrefaction.
tagline: Welcome to the world of salirophilia!
title: Defilement of a Porcelain Doll
